General

Object class of entry
Common name (cn) contains
Description text (description) contains
User attributes
POSIX-UID (uidNumber) is
Home directory path (homeDirectory) is
Shell path name is
GECOS field (gecos) contains
Group attributes
POSIX-UID (gidNumber) is
POSIX-UID of group member (memberUid) is
Device attributes
Network MAC address (macAddress) is
IP address (ipHostNumber) is
